title: Black screen after champion select
body:
this happened to me twice
1st one happened on normal game i couldn't load in and it says unable to connect to the server please check your internet connection and try again.
i also tried in training mode still black screen.
i have decent wifi, last patch i was playing with 54 to 55 ping then couldnt play after this patch {{item:3070}}


Edit: I Reinstalled the game, the black screen went away but all i see now is borders and brings me back to home page and says you have disconnected, i tried it using practice mode

replies.body: Hey there, suffering the same fate as you, full internet access yet black screen after champ select

dual band, 2.4ghz and 5ghz.
Have you been disconnected from practice tool?
